review: I was pleased with how quickly it installed and everything was setup within minutes. It streams well and we use it for Prime and Netflix streaming. I was a little nervous as our internet is not very fast, but it has not had any issues streaming content. My 4 stars is due to the fact that every once in a while there is no sound so we have to unplug it and replug back in to get the sound to start up again and the availability of free TV shows with Prime is crap. You have to pay for nearly every TV episode, but there are many free movies.
author: JSOM
